fr.gouv.vitam.common.client

Interface MockOrRestClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, VitamAutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccessExternalClient, AccessInternalClient, AdminClient, AdminExternalClient, AdminManagementClient, BasicClient, IngestExternalClient, IngestInternalClient, LogbookLifeCyclesClient, LogbookOperationsClient, MetaDataClient, OperationManagementClient, ProcessingManagementClient, SiegfriedClient, StorageClient, WorkerClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnection, AbstractMockClient, AdminExternalClientMock, AdminExternalClientRest, ConnectionImpl, ConnectionMockImpl, DefaultAdminClient, DefaultClient, IhmRecetteClient, IngestInternalClientMock, MetaDataClientMock, MetaDataClientRest, ProcessingManagementClientMock, SiegfriedClientRest, VitamRestTestClient, WorkspaceClient

    public interface MockOrRestClient
extends VitamAutoCloseable
    Basic client api for vitam client either in Mock or Rest mode
